biotools.summary: A quality control and analysis pipeline for parallel single cell transcriptome and epigenome data. It provides quality control and analysis functionalities for three data types: single cell transcriptome data, Drop-ChIP data and scATAC-seq data.

bioschemas.name: Dr.seq2
bioschemas.summary: A quality control and analysis pipeline for parallel single cell transcriptome and epigenome data. It provides quality control and analysis functionalities for three data types: single cell transcriptome data, Drop-ChIP data and scATAC-seq data.
